702690f-a.title: Brooklyn: 28th Street (East) - Quentin Road
702690f-a.text:
East 28th Street, west side, midway between 2uentin Road and Ave. R. In
the 1929 atlas it would be Ryder Ave., east side, between 99uentin Road and
Ave. R. B. Ryder (1857) and E.H. Ryder (1873) were the owners. This house
was still standing in 1929. Ryder Ave., (Ryder Lane) does not exist on the
1935 Atlas of Brooklyn.
April 1923.
Eugene L. Armbruster Collection.
MAY BE REPRODUCED.
